DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy of AX200 (filgrastim) in the treatment of acute ischemic stroke and to assess the safety and tolerability of AX200.
DOC.brief_title: AXIS 2: AX200 for the Treatment of Ischemic Stroke
DOC.criteria: Major diagnosis of acute ischemic stroke with an onset within 9 hours prior to start of study agent administration ischemic stroke in the MCA territory confirmed by MRI (diffusion) age ≥18 years and ≤85 years lesion size on DWI ≥15 ccm written informed consent Major prior to current stroke: inability to walk or to lead an independent life life expectancy less or equal 6 months stupor or coma lacunar infarct any evidence of ICH malignant hypertension presence of history of active malignancies platelet count <100/nl at randomization leukocyte count >20/nl at randomization congenital neutropenia pregnant or lactating women
